title: Healing Quick Transmigration: Blackened Male God, Come For a Hug - Novel Updates
tags: Amnesia   Ancient China   Ancient Times   Apocalypse   Beautiful Female Lead   Black Belly   Businessmen   Caring Protagonist   Clingy Lover   Cohabitation   College/University   Cultivation   Cute Story   Demons   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   Fated Lovers   Female Master   Female Protagonist   First Love   First-time Interc**rse   Gamers   Handsome Male Lead   Heartwarming   Jealousy   Love at First Sight   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Lovers Reunited   Male Yandere   Master-Disciple Relationship   Obsessive Love   Possessive Characters   Post-apocalyptic   Power Couple   Pregnancy   Second Chance   Showbiz   Siblings Not Related by Blood   System Administrator   Time Skip   Transmigration   World Hopping   Zombies
author: 折树梨花
description:
As a river demon who loved life, Yun Fanfan found it hard to believe that there were still people who did not want to live in this world. Thus, with a system on her, she embarked on the journey to save the male gods.
 
'Host, the male god, needs warmth!'
 
Hold on, I’ll immediately...
 
'Ho... host, the male god seems to have fallen for you.'
 
'Ah...' says Yun Fanfan.
 
Holding a knife, the male god approached closer, step by step, as he said, smiling, 'You said you wouldn’t leave me.'
 
Can you please put the knife down first and then talk?>
